content.html: How old were you when you found out the watermelon üçâ stereotype on Black People came from white people hating on the success of Black Farmers making a fortune selling the fruit. They used the stereotype to slow sales and taint our view of our own thriving businesses. I was 42.
content.value:
How old were you when you found out the watermelon üçâ stereotype on Black People came from white people hating on the success of Black Farmers making a fortune selling the fruit. They used the stereotype to slow sales and taint our view of our own thriving businesses.
I was 42.
